title: User launches profile page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps: When the user taps the Profile tab
custom_expected:
Then the user's personal profile should load and the screen will contain all relevant user information pertaining to their Head to Head Challenge in-app achievements
And the user will be able to view their User name
And the user will be able to view their Avatar
And the user will be able to view their Level & Rank
And the user will be able to view their Career Record for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their Win % for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their Points for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their Head to Head Rewards
And the user will be able to view their Total Rewards for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their List of badges earned (Trophy Case) for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their Most Challenged for the current year and lifetime
And the user will be able to view their List of Top Draft Picks for the current year and lifetime

title: Username appears correctly
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps:
When the user tabs the Profile tab
And views their user name
custom_expected: Then the user name should match that of the user

title: User avatar appears correctly in both retina/non-retina
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps:
When the user tabs the Profile tab
And views their avatar
custom_expected: Then the user's avatar should appear correctly on a retina/non-retina device

title: User Level appears correctly
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps:
When the user tabs the Profile tab
And views their level information
custom_expected: Then the user's level appears accurately

title: User stats appear correctly
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps:
When the user tabs the Profile tab
And views their personal stats
custom_expected:
Then the user will see their 2014 and Lifetime Record correctly (Record)
And the user will see their 2014 and Lifetime Challenge Win% correctly (Win %)
And the user will see their 2014 and Lifetime Head to Head Challenge Points Scored correctly (Points)
And the user will see their 2014 and Lifetime In-App Rewards Points Earned Scored correctly (Head to Head Rewards)
And the user will see their Total Rewards Points Earned Scored correctly (Total Rewards)

title: 'Settings' button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has selected the 'My Profile' tab
custom_steps: When the user selects the 'Settings' button in the top left corner
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the settings page

title: 'My Friends' button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has selected the 'My Profile' tab
custom_steps: When the user selects the 'My Friends' button in the top right corner
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the 'My Friends' page

title: User taps on "Trophy Case" row from their profile page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user tabs the Profile tab
AND taps on their "Trophy Case" row
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Badges "Trophy Case" page
AND all the user's earned badges will display
AND all unearned badges will display
AND all unearned badges will be distinguishable from the earned badges (grayscale)

title: User has not earned any badges and views "Badges Trophy Case" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
AND the user has not earned any badges
AND the user navigates to their profile
AND the user taps on the Trophy Case section
custom_steps: AND views their Badge Trophy Case page
custom_expected: THEN the following message will display: "No badges have been earned."

title: User has earned at least one badge and views "Badges Trophy Case" screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
AND the user has earned at least one badge
AND the user navigates to their profile
AND the user taps on the Trophy Case section
custom_steps: AND views their Badge Trophy Case page
custom_expected:
THEN the list of earned badges would be seen
AND all unearned badges would appear in grayscale
AND all unearned badges would be locked

title: User earns a badge with push notification set to 'Off'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
AND has Push Alerts set to off
AND the user navigates to their profile
AND the user taps on the Trophy Case section
custom_steps: AND views their Badge Trophy Case page
custom_expected: Then a badge is displayed with proper number for times it was earned.

title: User earns their first badge with push notifications set to 'On'
custom_preconds:
Given a user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has not earned any previous badges
And the user has push notifications for the app set to 'ON'
And the user completes requirements to earn a badge
custom_steps: When the badge is granted to the user
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a push notification announcing the badge earned
And the notification will be for the correct badge

title: User earns additional badges with push notifications set to 'On'
custom_preconds:
Given a user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has already earned at least one badge
And the user has push notifications for the app set to 'On'
And the user completes requirements to earn a badge
custom_steps: When the badge is granted to the user
custom_expected: Then the user will NOT receive a push notification announcing the badge earned

title: Verify badges (color and gray-scale) appear in retina/non-retina on profile
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has signed in
And the user has navigated to their profile
And the user views the Badges section
custom_steps: When the user views all the available badges
custom_expected: Then they will all appear correctly in color with retina/non-retina devices

title: Verify badges (color and gray-scale) appear in retina/non-retina on 'Badges Trophy Case' page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has signed in
And the user has navigated to their profile
And the user has tapped on the badges section
And the Badges Trophy Case has opened
custom_steps: When the user views all the available badges
custom_expected:
Then they will all appear correctly in color with retina/non-retina devices
And they will all appear correctly in gray-scale with retina/non-retina devices

title: 'Draft Wiz' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user has initiated a challenge against another user
And the user scores the most points in a single Head to Head Challenge for the day
custom_expected: Then the user will earn and receive the 'Draft Wiz' badge

title: 'Challenge Creator' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has never initiated a challenge with another user previously
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps: When the user initiates a challenge with another user
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Challenge Creator' badge

title: 'Challenge Winner' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
And the user has never won a challenge before
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge with another user
And the user wins the challenge
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Challenge Winner' badge

title: 'Winning Streak' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge with another user
And the user wins three consecutive challenges in a row
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the Winning Streak badge

title: 'Mr. Know It All' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates a challenge against the MLB expert
And wins the challenge against the MLB expert
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the Mr. Know It All badge

title: 'Crush Badge'
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge with another user
And the user wins the challenge by more than 15 points
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Crush' badge

title: 'Movin' on up' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has a level of 1
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge
And the user gets rewarded a new level (Level 2) because of their point value
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Movin' on up' badge

title: 'Top Dog' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps: When the user starts the day at the top of the overall Head to Head leaderboard
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the Top Dog badge

title: 'Win 25 Challenges' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge
And the user wins 25 challenges
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Win 25 Challenges' badge

title: 'Win 50 Challenges' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge
And the user wins 50 challenges
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Win 50 Challenges' badge

title: 'Century Club' badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user navigates to the Challenges tab
custom_steps:
When the user initiates/accepts a challenge
And the user wins 100 challenges
custom_expected: Then the user will earn the 'Win 100 (Century Club)' badge

title: All available badges
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has signed in
And the user has navigated to their profile
And the user has tapped on the badges section
And the Badges Trophy Case has opened
custom_steps: When the user has earned all available badges
custom_expected:
Then the Badges Trophy Case page will have all badges appear in color
And clicking on an individual badge will bring the user to the "Badge Detail" screen
And the individual badge page will show a larger badge image as well as the badge name and a description of requirements for earning the badge

title: Un-earned badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has signed in
And the user has navigated to the 'My Profile' page
And the user has tapped on the 'Trophy Case' button
And the Trophy Case has opened
custom_steps: When the user has tapped on unearned badges
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to the locked individual badge page 
And be shown a larger locked badge image
And the badge name 
And a description of requirements for earning the badge

title: Badge Trophy page without connectivity
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has signed in
And the user has navigated to their profile
And the user has tapped on the badges section
And the user has limited connectivity
custom_steps: And the Badges Trophy Case has opened
custom_expected:
Then the app should display a message to the user that there is limited connectivity
And the message should be clear and free of grammatical errors

GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
AND the user tabs the Profile tab
AND the user has not completed any challenges
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views their level
AND the user has less than 15 reward points
custom_expected: THEN their level will appear as 'Level 1: Fringe Prospect'

title: User has not drafted any players
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has not drafted any players
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile
And selects the Top Draft Picks section
custom_expected:
Then the Top Draft Picks Detail Page will open
And the page should read “No draft picks have been made...”

title: User taps on Top Drafted Picks listed in their user profile
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has drafted at least 1 player
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And selects the Top Draft Picks section
custom_expected:
Then the "Top Draft Picks" details page will load
And the user will see the top 20 most frequently drafted players by the user
And the user will see the headshot of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player name correctly
And the user will see the amount of times the user has drafted the player to the right of the player's name
And the user will see points earned for the user by that player

title: User taps Top Draft Picks when there is no connectivity
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has tapped on Top Draft Picks within their profile
custom_steps: When the user has lost connectivity
custom_expected:
Then the "Top Draft Picks" details page will attempt to load
And the user will be notified of their limited connectivity

title: User views "Top Draft Picks" details page and has made less than 20 draft picks
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has drafted less than 20 players
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And the user taps on Top Draft Picks
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the a list of the user's most frequently drafted players
And the user will see the headshot of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player name correctly
And the user will see the amount of times the user has drafted the player to the right of the player's name
And the user will see points earned for the user by that player

title: User views "Top Draft Picks" details page and has made more than 20 draft picks
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has drafted more than 20 players
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And the user taps on Top Draft Picks
custom_expected:
Then the user will see only the top 20 user's most frequently drafted players
And the user will see the headshot of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player name correctly
And the user will see the amount of times the user has drafted the player to the right of the player's name
And the user will see points earned for the user by that player

title: "Top Draft Picks" updates after a challenge is completed and locked in
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has drafted at least 4 players
custom_steps:
When the user completes a challenge 
And locks in the challenge results
And views their profile
custom_expected: Then the 'Top Draft Picks' should be updated to reflect any changes for the user

title: User taps on Most Challenged Friends listed in their user profile
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And selects the Most Challenged Friends section
custom_expected:
Then the "Most Challenged" details page will load
And the user will see the top 25 most frequently challenged players by the user
And the user will see the profile image of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player's Display Name correctly
And the user will see the their record vs the user (W-L-T)
And the user will see points scored vs the app user - ex: 416.4 - 800.5 (app user points always listed first)

title: User taps Most Challenged Friends when there is no connectivity
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has tapped on Most Challenged Friends within their profile
custom_steps: When the user has lost connectivity
custom_expected:
Then the "Most Challenged" details page will attempt to load
And the user will be notified of their limited connectivity

title: User views "Most Challenged Friends" details page and has played less than 25 friends
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has challenged less than 25 friends
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And the user taps on Most Challenged Friends
custom_expected:
Then the "Most Challenged" details page will load
And the user will see the most frequently challenged players by the user
And the user will see the profile image of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player's Display Name correctly
And the user will see the their record vs the user (W-L-T)
And the user will see points scored vs the app user - ex: 416.4 - 800.5 (app user points always listed first)

title: User views "Most Challenged Friends" details page and has played more than 25 friends
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed and launched the app
And the user has logged in
And the user has challenged more than 25 friends
custom_steps:
When the user views their profile page
And the user taps on Most Challenged Friends
custom_expected:
Then the "Most Challenged" details page will load
And the user will see the only the top 25 most frequently challenged players by the user
And the user will see the profile image of each player (retina/non-retina)
And the user will see the player's Display Name correctly
And the user will see the their record vs the user (W-L-T)
And the user will see points scored vs the app user - ex: 416.4 - 800.5 (app user points always listed first)

title: "Most Challenged Friends" updates after a challenge is completed and locked in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the app
AND the user has logged in
AND the user has challenged a friend
custom_steps:
WHEN the user completes a challenge 
AND the challenge has scored
custom_expected: THEN the 'Most Challenged Friends' should be updated to reflect the new stats
